name: Studying
body: Study is the most important part of daily life. One should maintain a daily routine to finish his/her study.

name: Meditation
body: Meditaion makes people stay calm and determined. People should spend at least 10-15 min daily to do meditation at daily morning.

name: Jogging
body: Jogging helps us to keep our body fit and healthy. It reduces fat and help us to stay fresh whole day.

name: Swimming
body: Swimming is such exercise that helps us to do whole body workout. It helps us to increase our blood circulation and stamina level.

name: Lunch
body: One can not survive without food. So it's important for everyone to have a good and healthy lunch to maintain a good health.

name: Spending Time with Family
body: Family is the most important part of our life. So we should try to spend at least a good amount of time with our family daily.
